sentences.english: The reaction of ozone destruction is the chain reaction.
sentences.chinese: 破坏臭氧的反应是链反应。

sentences.english: Climate change and the depleted ozone layer are among the starkest examples.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化和臭氧层耗减就是其中最明显的例子。

sentences.english: I use anthocyanidins and antioxidants in conjunction with the ozone therapy.
sentences.chinese: 我用的是臭氧治疗和抗氧化剂花青素与配合。

sentences.english: Application of ozone injections on the paravertebral muscles, as an outpatient.
sentences.chinese: 应用臭氧注射液对椎旁肌肉，作为门诊。

sentences.english: The influence of operation conditions on the degradation of 4-nitrophenol in water by ozone was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了各种操作条件对臭氧降解水中对硝基酚的影响。

sentences.english: The system also brought sunny skies and high temperatures that resulted in the formation of ground-level ozone.
sentences.chinese: 高气压也引发高温和晴天，导致地面臭氧生成。

sentences.english: If you breathe too much ozone it can cause all kinds of respiratory problems.
sentences.chinese: 吸入过多的臭氧，会引起呼吸器官的多种疾病。

sentences.english: Elevated ozone concentration influences insect behaviours by changing semiochemicals.
sentences.chinese: 臭氧还通过改变化学信息物质而影响昆虫的行为。

sentences.english: The intensity of near-earth ultraviolet(UV)radiation is increasing with the spoilage of ozone layer.
sentences.chinese: 由于臭氧层损耗，使地球表面的紫外线辐射量增加。

sentences.english: Below is a picture of 30G mobile type ozone generator.
sentences.chinese: 下面是30G移动式臭氧发生器的图片。

sentences.english: Ozone recovery at the poles will be minimally affected by climate change.
sentences.chinese: 两极地区的臭氧恢复将受气候变化的影响最小。

sentences.english: 'Nothing's wrong with he satellite, ' Kiah answered quietly. 'It's AOL.
sentences.chinese: “卫星没问题，”凯平静地回答，“是人工臭氧层。”

sentences.english: We use ozone concentrations ranging from 40 to 100 ug per ml.
sentences.chinese: 我们使用的臭氧浓度为每毫升40微克至100。

sentences.english: Excess organics tax ozonation and foam fractionating systems.
sentences.chinese: 多余的有机物税臭氧和泡沫分馏系统。

sentences.english: Climate change is bringing mixed news to the ozone layer.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化带给臭氧层的消息是喜忧掺半的。

sentences.english: You don't know how to fix the holes in our ozone layer.
sentences.chinese: 你们不知道该如何填补臭氧层的破洞吧？

definition: fine particle (PM 2.5)/fine particulate matter (air pollution etc)
